title: Bug 5473 ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473 ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251.
OB: When executing ShiftLeft on two lines of text, nothing moves.
EB: When executing ShiftLeft, the second line should be shifted left and the first line should be shifted left at least to the space character (i.e., get rid of the tab). There shouldn't be any stray spaces.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open a default text editor.
2. Type in the following:
   - Line 1: [space] [tab] some text
   - Line 2: [tab] some text 2
3. Highlight the two lines and execute ShiftLeft.
4. Verify that the text doesn't move.
